meanings: be ready to (do), be about to (do), set about to (do), be going to (do), be on the point[brink, verge] of (doing)
I wonder (if, whether, what, who, where, etc.)

examples.korean: It is time for them to enjoy their share of happiness with their family members. 발음듣기 이제는 그들이 가족과 함께 행복을 나누는 것을 누 려야 할 때입니다. Neungyule
examples.english: It is time for them to enjoy their share of happiness with their family members. 발음

examples.korean: The cash-strapped Russian space program has sought to supplement inadequate government funding with revenues from space tourism. 발음듣기 자금이 부족한 러시아의 우주 프로그램은 우주 관광사 업에서 얻은 수익으로 불충분한 정부의 지원 자금을 보충하 려 노력해 왔다. Neungyule
examples.english: The cash-strapped Russian space program has sought to supplement inadequate government funding with revenues from space tourism. 발음

examples.korean: Tej Vir Singh, the director of the Center for Tourism Research and Development in Lucknow, said in general smaller ski resorts are preferable to large scale ones like the Himalayan Ski Village. 발음듣기 럭나우의 관광 연구 개발센터 소장 테이 비르 싱은 전반적으로 더 작은 스키 리 조트들이 히말라야 스키 마을 같은 대규모의 것들보다 오히 려 더 낫다고 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Tej Vir Singh, the director of the Center for Tourism Research and Development in Lucknow, said in general smaller ski resorts are preferable to large scale ones like the Himalayan Ski Village. 발음

examples.korean: Army General Leon LaPorte, commander of U.S. Forces Korea, told the press that South Korea's desire to take more responsibility for its own defense is 'a natural evolution' that directly reflects the country's increasing military capabilities. 발음듣기 리온 라포트 주한미군사령관은 국방의 책임을 더 맡으 려는 한국의 희망은 한국의 증가하는 군사력을 직접 반영하 는 자연스러운 발전이라고 보도기관에 말했다. Neungyule
examples.english: Army General Leon LaPorte, commander of U.S. Forces Korea, told the press that South Korea's desire to take more responsibility for its own defense is 'a natural evolution' that directly reflects the country's increasing military capabilities. 발음

examples.korean: The highly anticipated Scarlet Heart: Ryeo, a remake of the hit Chinese drama Startling by Each Step, is only a few days away from airing in Korea. 발음듣기 큰 기대를 얻고 있는 중국 히트드라마 <보보경심>을 한국판으로 리메이크한 작품 <달인 연인: 보보경심 려>가 며칠 뒤 한국에서 방송될 예정이다. TIMES CORE
examples.english: The highly anticipated Scarlet Heart: Ryeo, a remake of the hit Chinese drama Startling by Each Step, is only a few days away from airing in Korea. 발음
